title: Starry Night
description: Starry night sky, made me miss going out and adventuring through the quiet forest. I can remember that day clearly, when the rain tickled my nose and the wet moss seeped through my toes. I was thrilled to see so many comets fly across the clear night sky. I made a wish that day, although I had forgetton about. Today reminded me, how little I was in this universe. Fin.
